callouts.title: Three Floors
callouts.body: Ground, first, and second floors open all weekend with staffed access points.

callouts.title: South Entrance
callouts.body: Enter via the south side plaza; signage and volunteers guide you inside.

callouts.title: Makerspace
callouts.body: Bench tools and soldering bays staffed by techniciansâ€”bring safety footwear.

callouts.title: Power & Wi-Fi
callouts.body: High-capacity Wi-Fi and power strips at every bank of desks.

callouts.title: Quiet Areas
callouts.body: Dedicated rest zones and prayer room on level 2 for downtime.
